name: DiagnosisOfAcuteOtitisMedia
title: Diagnosis of Acute Otitis Media
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This code cluster is intended to capture a diagnosis of acute otitis media likely to meet AAP recommended indications for antibiotic therapy, as distinct from otitis media with effusion or unspecified otitis media),(Data Element Scope: The intent of this cluster is to represent a coded diagnosis likely compatible with acute  otitis media.  Codes described as acute otitis or suppurative otitis without a chronic qualifier are included.),(Inclusion Criteria: Codes indicative of acute suppurative otitis media),(Exclusion Criteria: Codes indicative of non-acute otitis media, whether or not suppurative, or likely to include both acute and non-acute otitis media, are excluded.)
